summary: MBA graduate with cross-disciplinary experience in healthcare and IT, focusing on business analysis. Aims to leverage professional knowledge and skills to analyze and optimize business processes as a business analyst.

experience.title: Information Technology Internship
experience.description: Examined problems between users and systems. Worked at different hospital stations, including ER, Registration, Pharmacy, Central Sterile Supplies Department (CSSD), and Medical Supplies storeroom.

experience.title: Business Analyst
experience.description: Worked with Tourism Bureau to publish 'Taiwan Hot Spring Voucher' to promote Taiwan. Generated 3K followers on Facebook within 3 months. Built and designed official website.

experience.title: Chief Executive Officer
experience.description: Expanded five new business sites, two located at large-scale department stores in the country. Planned cultural events, including Simple Life Festival in Taipei and Shanghai. Launched limited edition custom dresses with bloggers; 100 dresses sold out within 4 hours. Increased sales by 25% in two quarters.

experience.title: Campus Youth E-Service Volunteer
experience.description: Planned summer and winter camps for kids who lack educational resources. Team lead and Recorder.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Management
education.school: National Taipei University of Nursing and Health Science
